file(GLOB SRC_CACHE "*.cpp")
add_library(cache_lib STATIC ${SRC_CACHE})

add_subdirectory(frontend)
add_subdirectory(full_file_cache)
add_subdirectory(ocf_cache)

    cache_frontend_lib
    full_file_cache_lib
    ocf_cache_lib
)
target_include_directories(cache_lib PUBLIC
    ${PHOTON_INCLUDE_DIR}
)
